readable.title: 491564019_1ca68d16c1
readable.content: A child enjoying themselves on a yellow slide at a park . A little girl in a yellow t-shirt is tumbling towards the end of a yellow slide . A little girl slides down a twisty yellow slide . A small blond girl wearing a yellow shirt sliding down a yellow slide with her feet in the air . A young girl with a yellow shirt sliding down a yellow slide
